alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 12:00AM CDT until September 06 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Western Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Pea Ridge to near Rogers to 2 miles southeast of Cave Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Holiday Island... Gateway... Beaver... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... War Eagle... Urbanette... Grandview... Avoca... Beaver Lake... Larue... Pleasant Ridge... Best... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 77 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
